question: As per the special Scheme of Maharashtra Government to Curb infant deaths which of the following commodities/ facilities will be provided to the children?
option2: Free milk product up to the age of 1 year
explanation: As per the special Scheme of Maharashtra Government to Curb infant deaths Baby care kits worth Rs. 2,000 will be provided to the first children born in Primary health centers and Government Hospitals. The kit will contain a blanket, a thermometer, a mattress, a towel, toys, baby oil, shampoo, nail cutter, socks, gloves, etc.
